mapper.select: select * from guide order by bird_name;

select.if: select * from guide where bird_name like concat('%',#{searchString},'%') or bird_SName like concat('%',#{searchString},'%');
select * from guide where ${search} like concat('%',#{searchString},'%');
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㄱ|ㄲ)' or (bird_name >= '가' and bird_name < '나') order by bird_name;
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㄴ)' or (bird_name >= '나' and bird_name < '다') order by bird_name;
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㄷ)' or (bird_name >= '다' and bird_name < '라') order by bird_name;
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㄹ)' or (bird_name >= '라' and bird_name < '마') order by bird_name;
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㅁ)' or (bird_name >= '마' and bird_name < '바') order by bird_name;
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㅂ)' or (bird_name >= '바' and bird_name < '사') order by bird_name;
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㅅ|ㅆ)' or (bird_name >= '사' and bird_name < '아') order by bird_name;
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㅇ)' or (bird_name >= '아' and bird_name < '자') order by bird_name;
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㅈ|ㅉ)' or (bird_name >= '자' and bird_name < '차') order by bird_name;
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㅊ)' or (bird_name >= '차' and bird_name < '카') order by bird_name;
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㅋ)' or (bird_name >= '카' and bird_name < '타') order by bird_name;
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㅌ)' or (bird_name >= '타' and bird_name < '파') order by bird_name;
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㅍ)' or (bird_name >= '파' and bird_name < '하') order by bird_name;
select * from guide where bird_name rlike '^(ㅎ)' or (bird_name >= '하') order by bird_name;

mapper.select: select * from guide where part = #{part} order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select count(*) from guide where part = #{part} ;
select * from guide where search = #{search} and searchString = #{searchString} and part = #{part} order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select count(*) from guide where bird_name like concat('%',#{part},'%') ;
select count(*) from guide where search=#{search} and searchString = #{searchString} and part = #{part};
mapper.update: UPDATE guide SET readNum = readNum+1 WHERE idx = #{idx};
